name: Beat Boxer (itch)
description:
COMPETITION SIGN-UPS! Do you have what it takes to become the World's Greatest Beatboxer?
 Need some practice? Head to the gym to work on your reflexes!
Sign-up for the Tournament below! Notes from the Developers

Thank you everyone for taking the time to look at our game. The jam has been amazing, fun, and a great learning experience. If you have any feedback or comments about the game please share them so we can continue to improve. Thanks again for playing and Jam on.

Brett Leishman 

Artist, Designer, Composer

Jared Mercer

Programmer, Designer, SFX Composer
